name: Dragonic Fusion
text: At the beginning of the Duel, add "Dragon's Mirror" to your Deck and shuffle it. Then, add "Five-Headed Dragon" to your Extra Deck. This Skill can only be used once per Duel. Can be used when your Life Points decrease by 1500. Return 1 card from your hand to your Deck and add "Dragon's Mirror" to you hand from your Deck.
